name: Mushrooms Dating Café
description:
Welcome to the Mushrooms Dating Café! 

Your mission? Create the best potions to serve your clients. 

The goal? Match them all, discover all the recipes, and enjoy the power of LOVE!

Controls:

Point & click

Art, code and music are fully original and made for this jam. SFX are from SFXs bundles.

Made with Godot for the Cozy-Autumn-Jam-22.
